channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #124 – Composer Library Scene Management

item.title: By: Carlos Antunes
item.dc:creator: Carlos Antunes
item.description: Hello Husam, I've just found the code here: https://github.com/roaminggamer/CoronaGeek/blob/master/Hangouts/composer_scene_manager.zip
item.content:encoded:
Hello Husam,
I’ve just found the code here:
https://github.com/roaminggamer/CoronaGeek/blob/master/Hangouts/composer_scene_manager.zip

item.title: By: Carlos Antunes
item.dc:creator: Carlos Antunes
item.description:
Hello,
It was a really good show, I learned a lot with it. I just couldn't download the code from the Hangout. Could you please fix the link?
Thanks in advance.
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

It was a really good show, I learned a lot with it.
I just couldn’t download the code from the Hangout.
Could you please fix the link?

Thanks in advance.

item.title: By: Husam Sarris
item.dc:creator: Husam Sarris
item.description:
Hi! I really enjoyed it! You made the composer a lot clearer for me.
Just one issue; the link for Code download is broken! Did you remove the files from Github?
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Hi!
I really enjoyed it! You made the composer a lot clearer for me.

Just one issue; the link for Code download is broken! Did you remove the files from Github?

Thanks.

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
Fantastic show! Thanks so much Ed for your great info. Of course thank you Charles for making this show possible in the first place. I will say that CoronaGeek is with the forum, are the best part of Corona!
Keep up the great job :)
Mo
ps1: I was SO happy to be able to participate in the show in realtime. It is very rare for me unfortunately. Thanks God for the replay!
ps2: Thanks so much Charles for adding one of my quiz app link in the show notes. Everything helps! If anybody interested (if you have kids..) you can check my latest quiz related to food (please feel free to remove the link if it is not allow here)
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/quiz-pic-food-trivia-game/id953920962?ls=1&mt=8
